file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 55-13-01-04 - HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER LEADING-EDGE ROOT FAIRING RUBBER SEAL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER LEADING-EDGE ROOT FAIRING RUBBER SEAL - REMOVAL/ INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading-Edge Root Fairing Rubber Seal. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER LEADING- ALL 55-13-01-000-801-A EDGE ROOT FAIRING RUBBER SEAL - REMOVAL HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER LEADING- ALL 55-13-01-400-801-A EDGE ROOT FAIRING RUBBER SEAL - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 55-13-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 55-13-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER LEADING-EDGE ROOT FAIRING RUBBER SEAL - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading-Edge Root Fairing Rubber Seal. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER LEADING-EDGE ROOT AMM TASK 55-13-00-000-801-A/400 FAIRINGS - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 331 LH Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading Edge 332 RH Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading Edge D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) Fed. Spec. TT-M-261 Methyl-ethyl-ketone (MEK) AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE LH or RH Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading 1 Does the task Edge I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Refer to Figure 401 and remove the Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading-Edge Root Fairing (1) (LH or RH) ( AMM TASK 55-13-00-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 55-13-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the fourteen screws (4) and washers (5) that attach the strap (3) to the fairing (1). (2) With a cloth soaked in MEK, clean the surface. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 55-13-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading-Edge Root Fairing Rubber Seal - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONES 331 332 A DET. A B 1. HORIZONTAL STABILIZER LEADING EDGE ROOT FAIRING 5. WASHER 4. SCREW 3. STRAP 2. RUBBER SEAL DET. B 145AMM550046.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 55-13-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 55-13-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER LEADING-EDGE ROOT FAIRING RUBBER SEAL - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading-Edge Root Fairing Rubber Seal. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER LEADING-EDGE ROOT AMM TASK 55-13-00-400-801-A/400 FAIRINGS - INSTALLATION IPC 55-15-00 LEADING EDGE C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 331 LH Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading Edge 332 RH Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading Edge D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Rubber Seal IPC 55-15-00 AR H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE LH or RH Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading 1 Does the task Edge I. Installation (Figure 401 ) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the rubber seal (2) between the strap (3) and the horizontal-stabilizer leading-edge root fairing (1) (LH or RH). NOTE: • Make sure that the rubber seal (2) is not damaged. If necessary, replace it with a new one. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 55-13-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • In the new rubber seal installation process, use the strap (3) as a template to make the necessary holes. (2) Install the fourteen screws (4) and washers (5) that attach the strap (3) to the fairing (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the horizontal-stabilizer leading-edge root fairing (1) (LH or RH) ( AMM TASK 55-13-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 55-13-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
